abstract: I got an opportunity to be part of happy2help group ( https://happy2help.org.in/ ) and to start with, I presented a introductory session on API Test Automation with ZeroCode Framework. Have a look at the YouTube video for detailed explanation with hands-on code on the call. There is a also a little talk in the start and end of the call about what Happy2Help group is all about and doing all awesome work!
title: Introduction to ZeroCode Framework @ YouTube - Happy2Help
